languages.text: {n}Тон солдата становится ябедничающим.{/n} "Жуткое местечко. Говорят, они регулярно заказывают с Райкада Минорис шаттлы с обслугой. Не самим же им фильтры менять и отсеки прибирать. Только я никогда в жизни не встречал человека, который бы там служил. Будто не возвращается никто".

{n}It is beginning to sound like he is complaining.{/n} "That place is creepy. They say they order shuttles with servants from Rykad Minoris on a regular basis. I guess they're too important up there to change filters and clean compartments themselves, huh? Except, I've never met anyone who has served there. It's like no one ever comes back."
languages.original_text: {n}Тон солдата становится ябедничающим.{/n} "Жуткое местечко. Говорят, они регулярно заказывают с Райкада Минорис шаттлы с обслугой. Не самим же им фильтры менять и отсеки прибирать. Только я никогда в жизни не встречал человека, который бы там служил. Будто не возвращается никто".

I guess they're too important up there to change filters and clean compartments, huh? Except, I've never actually met anyone who has served there. It's like no one ever comes back."

I guess they're too important up there to change filters and clean compartments, huh? Except, I've never actually met anyone who has served there. It's like no one ever comes back."

I guess they're too important up there to change filters and clean compartments themselves, huh? Except, I've never met anyone who has served there. It's like no one ever comes back."

I guess they're too important up there to change filters and clean compartments themselves, huh? Except, I've never met anyone who has served there. It's like no one ever comes back."

{n}It is beginning to sound like he is complaining.{/n} "That place is creepy. They say they order shuttles with servants from Rykad Minoris on a regular basis. I guess they're too important up there to change filters and clean compartments themselves, huh? Except, I've never met anyone who has served there. It's like no one ever comes back."

languages.text: {n}Es klingt langsam, als würde er sich beschweren.{/n} "Die Station ist gruselig. Angeblich fordern sie regelmäßig Shuttles mit Dienern von Rykad Minoris an. Die sind da oben wohl zu wichtig, um selbst Filter zu wechseln und die Station zu reinigen. Nur bin ich noch nie jemandem begegnet, der da oben gedient hat. Fast, als würde nie jemand zurückkommen."
languages.original_text: {n}It is beginning to sound like he is complaining.{/n} "That place is creepy. They say they order shuttles with servants from Rykad Minoris on a regular basis. I guess they're too important up there to change filters and clean compartments themselves, huh? Except, I've never met anyone who has served there. It's like no one ever comes back."

traits.locale_text: {n}Es klingt langsam, als würde er sich beschweren.{/n} "Die Station ist gruselig. Angeblich fordern sie regelmäßig Shuttles mit Dienern von Rykad Minoris an. Die sind da oben wohl zu wichtig, um selbst Filter zu wechseln und die Station zu reinigen. Nur bin ich noch nie jemandem begegnet, der da oben gedient hat. Fast, als würde nie jemand zurückkommen."

languages.text: {n}Vous commencez à avoir l'impression qu'il se plaint.{/n} « C'est un endroit sordide, on raconte qu'ils commandent régulièrement des navettes entières de serviteurs de Rykad Minoris. Ils doivent se croire trop importants pour faire le ménage eux-mêmes, j'imagine... sauf que je n'ai jamais croisé un seul domestique là-bas. C'est comme si personne n'en revenait jamais. »
languages.original_text: {n}It is beginning to sound like he is complaining.{/n} "That place is creepy. They say they order shuttles with servants from Rykad Minoris on a regular basis. I guess they're too important up there to change filters and clean compartments themselves, huh? Except, I've never met anyone who has served there. It's like no one ever comes back."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous commencez à avoir l'impression qu'il se plaint.{/n} « C'est un endroit sordide, on raconte qu'ils commandent régulièrement des navettes entières de serviteurs de Rykad Minoris. Ils doivent se croire trop importants pour faire le ménage eux-mêmes, j'imagine... sauf que je n'ai jamais croisé un seul domestique là-bas. C'est comme si personne n'en revenait jamais. »

languages.text: {n}他的语气听起来像是抱怨。{/n}“那个地方真令人毛骨悚然。有人说，导航者会定期从小莱卡德订购满载仆人的穿梭机。我猜是那里的导航者太金贵了，不知道怎么更换滤芯，打扫房间吧？不过，我从来没见过在那里工作的人。或者说，我就没见到有人从那里回来过。”
languages.original_text: {n}It is beginning to sound like he is complaining.{/n} "That place is creepy. They say they order shuttles with servants from Rykad Minoris on a regular basis. I guess they're too important up there to change filters and clean compartments themselves, huh? Except, I've never met anyone who has served there. It's like no one ever comes back."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的语气听起来像是抱怨。{/n}“那个地方真令人毛骨悚然。有人说，导航者会定期从小莱卡德订购满载仆人的穿梭机。我猜是那里的导航者太金贵了，不知道怎么更换滤芯，打扫房间吧？不过，我从来没见过在那里工作的人。或者说，我就没见到有人从那里回来过。”

languages.text: {n}青年の声に不満がにじみ始める。{/n}「あの場所は気味が悪いですよ。定期的にライカド・ミノリス出身の従者にシャトルの注文を出してるらしいんです。フィルターの交換も部品の清掃も自分でできないなんて、高慢が過ぎません？ただ、そこで仕事をしてる奴に会ったこともないんですよ。誰ひとり、戻ってこないみたいで」
languages.original_text: {n}It is beginning to sound like he is complaining.{/n} "That place is creepy. They say they order shuttles with servants from Rykad Minoris on a regular basis. I guess they're too important up there to change filters and clean compartments themselves, huh? Except, I've never met anyone who has served there. It's like no one ever comes back."

traits.locale_text: {n}青年の声に不満がにじみ始める。{/n}「あの場所は気味が悪いですよ。定期的にライカド・ミノリス出身の従者にシャトルの注文を出してるらしいんです。フィルターの交換も部品の清掃も自分でできないなんて、高慢が過ぎません？ただ、そこで仕事をしてる奴に会ったこともないんですよ。誰ひとり、戻ってこないみたいで」

languages.text: {n}Empieza a sonar como si se estuviera quejando.{/n} «Ese lugar es espeluznante. Dicen que solicitan lanzaderas con sirvientes de Rykad Minoris con frecuencia. Supongo que allí arriba son demasiado importantes como para cambiar ellos mismos los filtros y limpiar los compartimentos, ¿no? Salvo que nunca he conocido a nadie que haya servido allí. Es como si nadie volviera de allí».
languages.original_text: {n}It is beginning to sound like he is complaining.{/n} "That place is creepy. They say they order shuttles with servants from Rykad Minoris on a regular basis. I guess they're too important up there to change filters and clean compartments themselves, huh? Except, I've never met anyone who has served there. It's like no one ever comes back."

traits.locale_text: {n}Empieza a sonar como si se estuviera quejando.{/n} «Ese lugar es espeluznante. Dicen que solicitan lanzaderas con sirvientes de Rykad Minoris con frecuencia. Supongo que allí arriba son demasiado importantes como para cambiar ellos mismos los filtros y limpiar los compartimentos, ¿no? Salvo que nunca he conocido a nadie que haya servido allí. Es como si nadie volviera de allí».

languages.text: {n}Sesi şikâyet eder gibi bir tona bürünüyor.{/n} "Ürkütücü bir yer. Rykad Minoris'ten düzenli olarak içi hizmetkâr dolu mekikler istedikleri söyleniyor. Kendi filtrelerini değiştirip kompartımanlarını temizleyemeyecek kadar çok işleri var herhâlde. Tek sıkıntı, orada görev yapan hiç kimseyi tanımıyor olmam. Sanki giden geri dönmüyor."
languages.original_text: {n}It is beginning to sound like he is complaining.{/n} "That place is creepy. They say they order shuttles with servants from Rykad Minoris on a regular basis. I guess they're too important up there to change filters and clean compartments themselves, huh? Except, I've never met anyone who has served there. It's like no one ever comes back."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sesi şikâyet eder gibi bir tona bürünüyor.{/n} "Ürkütücü bir yer. Rykad Minoris'ten düzenli olarak içi hizmetkâr dolu mekikler istedikleri söyleniyor. Kendi filtrelerini değiştirip kompartımanlarını temizleyemeyecek kadar çok işleri var herhâlde. Tek sıkıntı, orada görev yapan hiç kimseyi tanımıyor olmam. Sanki giden geri dönmüyor."
